commit.message:
Rollup merge of #47263 - ollie27:rustdoc_private_macro_import, r=GuillaumeGomez

rustdoc: Don't import macros from private imports

Fixes #47038

+#![feature(decl_macro)]
+
+#![crate_name = "foo"]
+
+use std::vec;
+
+// @has 'foo/index.html'
+// @!has - '//*[@id="macros"]' 'Macros'
+// @!has - '//a/@href' 'macro.vec.html'
+// @!has 'foo/macro.vec.html'
